CCA'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17). For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org or view our congress flyer.

International Conference on Cloud
Computing and Applications (CCA'17)

June 4 - 6, 2017 | Rome, Italy

Paper Submission

·

Important Dates

·

Registration

Search:


CCA'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17).
For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org or view our congress flyer.

Announcements

1

CCA 2017:

CCA 2017 will be held in Rome, Italy on June 4 - 6, 2017.

Deadline Extension:

Due to the popular request, the paper submission deadline is extended to March 24, 2017. This is the final deadline extension and the deadlines will not be extended anymore.

EECSS'17 Workshop

As per popular request, the organizing committee has decided to extend the EECSS'17 congress to three days (now June 4 - 6, 2017). The new high-level schedule is as follows:

  • Day 1: Workshop(s) and Registration
  • Day 2: Main Track Conference Sessions
  • Day 3: Main Track Conference Sessions and Gala dinner or Cruise tour

Registration for the workshop will be 122 EURs (VAT included) and separate from the main conferences. Workshop attendees will receive a certificate of participation. For registration, please visit: here.

More information to follow; we greatly appreciate your patience!

Poster Board Dimensions:

Authors presenting via poster boards are to be informed that poster boards are 100 cm height and 90 cm width.

2

Best Paper Award:

Two best paper awards will be conferred to author(s) of the papers that receive the highest rank during the peer-review and by the respected session chairs. Please visit Paper Submission for more information.

3

Propose Exhibits, Workshops & More

CCA attracts a wide range of researchers in the field of cloud computing and applications. As a prominent company in the field of computing and applications, we would like to offer you an exhibit at CCA. Please visit Events for more information.

The important dates and deadlines for the International Conference on Cloud Computing and Application (CCA'17) are as follows:
